rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a color, then exile two cards of that color from your graveyard. If you do, return a creature, instant, or sorcery card of that color from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: [i]All dressed up with nowhere to go.[/i]
